sentences.cn: 打好的非奶制糕点配料

sentences.en: All passengers should be eliminated from dairy herds.
sentences.cn: 所有不产奶的牛应从奶牛中清除出来.

sentences.en: Food subsidies are necessary for keeping down the price of dairy products and bread.
sentences.cn: 食品补贴对控制乳制品和面包的价格是必要的.

sentences.en: He avoids all meat and dairy products.
sentences.cn: 他不吃任何肉类和奶制品。

sentences.en: He kept a few dairy cows.
He still visited the dairy daily, but left most of the business details to his manager and foreman.
sentences.cn: 他仍然每天到乳品场看看，但把生意上大部分琐碎事务交给经理和工头打理。

sentences.en: His herd of 170 dairy cattle and 200 young stock are kept on the land.
sentences.cn: 他那170头奶牛和200头乳牛都在那块地上圈养。

sentences.en: I went to buy a paper at the corner dairy.
sentences.cn: 我到街角的小店去买了份报纸。

sentences.en: In my childhood, local dairies bought milk from local farmers.
sentences.cn: 在我小时候，本地的乳品公司向当地农场主收购牛奶。

sentences.en: Milk, butter, and cheese are shipped here from the dairy farms.
sentences.cn: 牛奶 、 黄油和奶酪都是各个制酪场运到这里来的.

sentences.en: Most equipment on the dairy farm was purchased with the worker's own earnings.
sentences.cn: 这个奶场的大部分设备都是工人们自己的劳动收益换来的.

sentences.en: Non-fat dairy products supply the needed nutrients without excessive calories.
sentences.cn: 脱脂乳制品能提供身体所需的营养，而不含过多的热量。

sentences.en: The feeding of dairy cows has undergone a revolution.
sentences.cn: 乳牛的喂养方法发生了巨大的改变。

sentences.en: The yogurt sold by this dairy is delicious.
sentences.cn: 这家乳品店出售的酸奶非常好喝。

sentences.en: They eat a lot of meats and dairy foods, along with a lot of miscellaneous items that don't fall into any group.
sentences.cn: 他们吃了大量的肉和奶制品，还有许多不知道该归为什么类别的杂七杂八的东西。

sentences.en: They ran the general store and the farm dairy.
sentences.cn: 他们经营着杂货店和农场的乳品店。

sentences.en: Yorkshire is still very much a farming community with good meat, good dairy produce and eggs.
sentences.cn: 约克郡在很大程度上仍以农业为主，出产优质肉类、奶制品和蛋类。

words.tran_cn: 酪农场的女工；乳牛场的女工
乳牛场主，乳品加工工人
[食品]乳品的；牛奶的；牛奶制的；产乳的
奶制品；乳牛；制酪场；[食品]乳品店；牛奶及乳品业

phrases.tran_cn: 乳品业，乳品加工业；乳制品行业

trans.tran_cn: 牛奶的，乳制的，乳品业的
trans.tran_en: Dairy is used to refer to foods such as butter and cheese that are made from milk

trans.tran_cn: 牛奶场，乳品店，乳品公司
trans.tran_en: a place on a farm where milk is kept and butter and cheese are made
